sqlMap.select: select count(board_seq) AS board_seq from ace.board

select board_seq, board_title, board_reg_data, board_notice, board_del_yn, board_content_text, board_writer_name, board_img_path, board_mod_data, @rownum := @rownum+1 AS board_num from board fb, (SELECT @rownum :=0) AS R order by board_num DESC LIMIT #pageStart#, #perPageNum#
sqlMap.insert: insert into board (board_title, board_reg_data, board_notice, board_del_yn, board_content_text, board_writer_name, board_mod_data, board_img_path )values (#board_title#, NOW(), #board_notice#, 'N', #board_content_text#, #board_writer_name#, NOW(), NULL)
